title: # 272 - Zane Lamprey & ME
description:
I sit down in the mancave with Zane Lamprey to talk about his Adventure hoodies, his adventure jackets kickstarter, our stories of snapping our plantar fasciitis, the time I got bit by a bat, and skiing in Switzerland.

Check out Zanes podcast "Zanes World" on iTunes

Go to the Adv3ture jackets kickstarter to donate to Zanes jacket.
https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/273791656/adv3nture-jackets

This episode is brought to you by Hims. A one stop shop for hair loss, skincare, sexual wellness, for men. My listeners get a trial month of everything you need to keep your hair - for just $5. Just go to www.forhims.com/bertcast 

This episode is also brought to you by Blue Apron. To get $30 off your first order with free shipping go to https://www.blueapron.com/bertcast 

This episode is also brought to you by Zip Recruiter. Try Zip Recruiter for free today by going to www.ziprecruiter.com/bertcast  

This episode is also brought to you by Shari’s Berries & Pro Flowers. Save 20% on any gift over $29 using the offer code “Bert” at www.berries.com 

 

For all TOUR DATE & MERCH click HERE: http://www.bertbertbert.com
